content: I don't have personal opinions or feelings. however, the performances of the actors in moonlight have received critical acclaim and numerous awards. both mahershala ali and naomie harris were nominated for academy awards for their supporting roles as juan and paula, respectively. ali won the award for best supporting actor, and barry jenkins won the oscar for best adapted screenplay. the young actor who portrayed chiron at different stages in his life, alex hibbert, ashton sanders, and trevante rhodes, also delivered powerful performances that successfully conveyed the complex emotions and experiences of the character. overall, the performances in moonlight were praised for their authenticity and emotional resonance, which contributed significantly to the film's impact.
